Tweets.description: First ad for the Roswell Paradox: The Temporal Key.
Tweets.text: Stranded in the distant past, attempting to preserve an uncertain future.\n The Roswell Paradox book 1 is an adventure in time that stretches across millions of years. Sometimes the only way forward is back. \n

Tweets.description: First Ad for the Roswell Paradox Book 2: Iteration
Tweets.text: Labeled as a Temporal Fugitives, Dayk must find a way to stop agents from ruining the future.\n Iteration is the trhilling climax to The Temporal Key!

Tweets.text: 'The Before Times' Recordings and Demos of Adam Benson from the days before Quarantine \n Get it on @AmazonMusic

Tweets.description: Another variation of an add for the books.
Tweets.text: I love to write stories. Do it as often as I can. \n Check out my 2 part book series, 'The Roswell Paradox' on @AmazonKindle! \n
'The Roswell Paradox: Iteration' is the second book I wrote for my 2 part series! Check it out and leave a review!

Tweets.description: The Amazon Ad for The Before Times
Tweets.text: I write a ton of music. Working on a new album now. Check out my last, 'The Before Times' on @AmazonMusic

Tweets.description: The Spotify Ad for The Before Times
Tweets.text: I write a ton of #music across many styles. Trying to finish a new album now. Check out my last, 'The Before Times' on @Spotify

Tweets.text: I write a ton of music. Working on a new album now. Check out my last, 'The Before Times' on @YoutubeMusic

Tweets.description: The Apple Music Ad for The Before Times
Tweets.text: I write a ton of music. Working on a new album now. Check out my last, 'The Before Times' on @AppleMusic
I wrote this song many years ago. It's called *'Spanish Inquisition'*! You can check it out on @Spotify
I wrote *'The Artifact'* years ago for a Demo Reel. Turned out really good! You can check it out on @Spotify
*'Angie Trent'* was a girl I knew who died in a car crash in High School. I wrote this as an homage.  You can check it out on @Spotify
*'Lies!'* I always liked this piece. Exes can be great inspiration for songs.  You can check it out on @Spotify

Tweets.description: Spotify link for Love on the Terrace
Tweets.text: I wrote *'Love on the Terrace'* after a trip to #Bisbee Arizona. #Theramin is always a fun instrument! You can check it out on @Spotify
